metadata.name: FIRST LOVE
metadata.description:
A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world, although it is impossible to be a perfect mother, a mother must try to be the best mother for her children. These ink scratches commemorate a child how much he misses his parents.

This work symbolizes that a mother's love is poured into a drop of ink that adorns her child's entire body.

Mother's said "If you do not understand when I speak my feelings, I will write the letters on your skin in ink scratches, and I will do anything so you will understand I love"
